steps.intro: Welcome to the Dice Throne 1v1 tutorial. Reduce your opponent to 0 Health before they do the same to you.
steps.stats: This panel shows your resources: Health (starts at 50) and CP (starts at 2, max 15). Most healing caps at starting Health +10.
steps.phases: Turn order lives here: Upkeep ‚Üí Income ‚Üí Main 1 ‚Üí Offensive Roll ‚Üí Defensive Roll ‚Üí Main 2 ‚Üí Discard. The first player skips Income on their first turn.
steps.dice: Your dice tray. You may roll up to 3 times each turn and lock dice you want to keep.
steps.rollButton: Use ‚ÄúRoll‚Äù to start rolling. When you‚Äôre satisfied or out of rolls, move to confirm.
steps.confirmButton: Confirm locks the result so you can pick a skill. If you want another roll, don‚Äôt confirm yet.
steps.abilities: Highlighted abilities are available to use. Pick one to begin attack resolution.
steps.hand: Your hand lives here. In Main phases you can play action cards or upgrades, or sell cards for CP.
steps.discard: This is the discard pile. Drag a card here to sell it for +1 CP.
steps.statusTokens: Status effects and tokens live here. Spend Evasive/Taiji/Purify at the right time; pay 2 CP before offense to remove Stun.
steps.advance: Use the ‚ÄúNext Phase‚Äù button once you‚Äôre done with the current phase.
steps.finish: That‚Äôs the 1v1 core flow. Try activating abilities, playing cards, and defeating your opponent!

stun.name: Stun
description: Before the Offensive Roll Phase, you may spend 2 CP to remove this token
If not removed, you must skip the phase and remove this token
stun.clickToRemove: Click to spend 2 CP to remove

confirmRemoveStun.title: Remove Stun?
confirmRemoveStun.description: Spend 2 CP to remove Stun, allowing you to proceed with the Offensive Roll Phase this turn.

taiji.name: Taiji
description: At any time, spend 1 Taiji to reduce incoming damage by 1
Before attacking, spend 1 Taiji to increase damage by 1
Taiji gained this turn cannot be used to boost damage this turn

evasive.name: Evasive
description: When taking damage, you may spend 1 Evasive and roll 1 die
On 1-2, damage becomes 0 (other effects still apply)
You may spend multiple Evasive to retry in the same attack

purify.name: Purify
description: At any time, spend 1 Purify to remove 1 negative status token
